name: In The Dark (itch) (Innocent Sakala)

Developer:

This project is still in early development. Updates, bug fixes and adding of new features will be done regularly until its final release.

I'm working solo on this project. Any donations would help to support the game's development. If not, it would be cool if you can provide me with comments, feedback, criticism and suggestions for the game down below in the comment section!
